mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_shop (shop_token, shop_id, shop_pw, category, name, introduction, created_at) VALUES (#{shopToken}, #{shopId}, #{shopPw}, #{category}, #{shopName}, #{shopIntroduction}, #{createdAt});

INSERT INTO tbl_shop_information (shop_token, phone, info_introduction, opening, holiday, instruction, homepage) VALUES (#{shopToken}, #{phone}, #{infoIntroduction}, #{opening}, #{holiday}, #{instruction}, #{homepage});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_shop WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} AND shop_pw = #{shopPw}
SELECT shop_token FROM tbl_shop WHERE shop_id = #{loginId}
